traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a Ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.description: Advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws against effects that would give it the Prone condition.
